snippet: A North Carolina-based charity said Thursday that a missionary who was infected with Ebola in Liberia was being flown to the Nebraska Medical Center in Omaha.
abstract: North Carolina-based missionary group SIM says Dr Rick Sacra, infected with Ebola in Liberia, is being treated at Nebraska Medical Center in Omaha.
lead_paragraph: A North Carolina-based charity said Thursday that a missionary who was infected with Ebola in Liberia was being flown to the Nebraska Medical Center in Omaha.

headline.main: Nebraska: Ebola Patient to Be Treated in Omaha
headline.print_headline: Nebraska: Ebola Patient to Be Treated in Omaha
